comment.author: 71034505@N06
comment._content: This photo is wrongly captioned. L to R it is Hardinge, Kestal-Cornish, Lenana and General George Hatch.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: How interesting. Could you post a source for that? Would be very interesting to know that whoever has captioned this volume has a rather hazy recollection of some of these people and places.

comment.author: 71034505@N06
comment._content: I don't have a source for this exactly but I have other pictures of Hatch and Macdonald which were almost certainly correct. Also the chap in the picture has a military style uniform with a medal. Macdonald was always a civilian - although they all managed to get medals - it's unlikely he would have worn the ribbon as a matter of course.
